questions.question: A machine learning engineer is tasked with automating the machine learning workflow, from data ingestion to model deployment. Which AWS services should the engineer use to automate the end-to-end ML lifecycle efficiently?
options: Use SageMaker Feature Store for all tasks, including data collection, model training, and deployment.
Use SageMaker Data Wrangler for data preparation, SageMaker Model Registry for model versioning, and SageMaker Pipelines to orchestrate the workflow.
Use AWS Glue for model development and SageMaker Pipelines for monitoring.
Manually write Python scripts to manage data ingestion, model development, and deployment on EC2 instances.
correct_answers: Use SageMaker Data Wrangler for data preparation, SageMaker Model Registry for model versioning, and SageMaker Pipelines to orchestrate the workflow.
questions.topic: Deployment and Orchestration of ML Workflows
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 2 -
